ok, here you go
Hope you get it to work

Well now the burning part:
1. Download the program IMG Burn

http://www.imgburn.com

2. Get a DL-DVD 
3. Open IMG Burn
5. Click Write to a Disk
6. Click at the top on Tools
7. Choose Settings
8. Choose the write tab
9. Set Layer-Break To 1913760
10. Select the .dvd file for burning
11. Burn on 2.4x Speed
12 Enjoy Playing Your Game!!!
